restaurant_pain_points.pain_point: Phone calls during busy kitchen hours
restaurant_pain_points.impact: Staff pulled away from food prep and in-person customers, $47,000+ annual hidden costs
restaurant_pain_points.stat: 63% of restaurants struggle to answer phone calls during busy periods (National Restaurant Association)
restaurant_pain_points.customer_quote: During lunch rush, our team couldn't handle the phone volume while maintaining food quality

restaurant_pain_points.pain_point: Lost phone orders and missed revenue
restaurant_pain_points.impact: 23% of potential phone orders lost due to busy signals, long hold times, overwhelmed staff
restaurant_pain_points.stat: Industry average 23% phone order loss rate
restaurant_pain_points.solution: AI answers 100% of calls, never misses an order

restaurant_pain_points.pain_point: Order accuracy problems in noisy environment
restaurant_pain_points.impact: 62% cite inaccurate orders as major complaint, leads to remakes, waste, lost customers
restaurant_pain_points.stat: 57% of customers not confident restaurants take modifications correctly when busy
restaurant_pain_points.solution: AI captures orders with 98.6% accuracy (Loman AI), 92% completion rate (Hostie)

restaurant_pain_points.impact: Unfilled shifts, ongoing training costs, annual labor cost $45,724 per position
restaurant_pain_points.stat: Labor shortages cited as #1 restaurant challenge 2024-2025
restaurant_pain_points.solution: AI augments labor at $5,998 annual cost = 760% ROI

restaurant_pain_points.impact: Lost revenue from calls outside operating hours, no 24/7 availability
restaurant_pain_points.stat: Many restaurants only answer phones during business hours
restaurant_pain_points.solution: 24/7 AI availability captures off-hours orders and reservations

restaurant_pain_points.pain_point: Large party bookings and catering inquiries
restaurant_pain_points.impact: Complex conversations require staff time during peak hours
restaurant_pain_points.solution: AI routes private dining and catering to appropriate staff with all details captured

restaurant_pain_points.impact: Staff repeatedly answering same questions about ingredients, allergens, hours
restaurant_pain_points.stat: Most common phone calls are basic FAQs
restaurant_pain_points.solution: AI handles all menu knowledge, hours, parking, and common questions

restaurant_pain_points.impact: Busy staff don't have time to suggest appetizers, desserts, drinks
restaurant_pain_points.solution: AI consistently upsells on every call, 15% average order value increase (Wing Zone)

capture_client_advantages: LOCAL SOUTHEAST FOCUS: Deep understanding of Tennessee, Georgia, North Carolina restaurant culture
AFFORDABLE PRICING: Target mid-market restaurants priced out by enterprise solutions like SoundHound
PERSONAL SERVICE: Small agency attention vs automated enterprise onboarding
FAST SETUP: Compete with Loman AI's 24-hour promise
MULTI-POS SUPPORT: Toast, Square, Clover, not locked to one vendor
FLEXIBLE INTEGRATIONS: OpenTable, Yelp, DoorDash, UberEats, Grubhub
